radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in shape and contour with normal echogenicity. No focal hepatic lesions. The main portal vein is patent. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilation. The common bile duct measures 4 mm. The gallbladder is normal without wall edema or pericholecystic fluid. No cholelithiasis. Evaluation of the pancreas is limited by overlying bowel gas. No ascites.
